ERROR_MESSAGES.AFTER_OR_EQUAL: The [:attribute] must be equal or after [:after_or_equal].
ERROR_MESSAGES.ALPHA: The [:attribute] field must contain only alphabetic characters.
ERROR_MESSAGES.ALPHA_DASH: The [:attribute] field may only contain alpha-numeric characters, as well as dashes and underscores.
ERROR_MESSAGES.BEFORE_OR_EQUAL: The [:attribute] must be equal or before [:before_or_equal].
ERROR_MESSAGES.BETWEEN: The [:attribute] field must be between [:min] and [:max].
ERROR_MESSAGES.DATE: The [:attribute] is not a valid date format.

MAX.NUMERIC: The [:attribute] may not be greater than [:max].
MAX.STRING: The [:attribute] may not be greater than [:max] characters.

MIN.STRING: The [:attribute] must be at least [:min] characters.

ERROR_MESSAGES.PRESENT: The [:attribute] field must be present (but can be empty).
ERROR_MESSAGES.REQUIRED_UNLESS: The [:attribute] field is required when [:other] is not [:value].
ERROR_MESSAGES.REQUIRED_WITH: The [:attribute] field is required when [:field] is not empty.
ERROR_MESSAGES.REQUIRED_WITH_ALL: The [:attribute] field is required when [:fields] are not empty.
ERROR_MESSAGES.REQUIRED_WITHOUT: The [:attribute] field is required when [:field] is empty.
ERROR_MESSAGES.REQUIRED_WITHOUT_ALL: The [:attribute] field is required when [:fields] are empty.

CUSTOM.AFTER_DATE: END TIME cannot be before START TIME.
CUSTOM.BEFORE_DATE: START TIME cannot be after END TIME.
CUSTOM.BEFORE_OR_EQUAL: The [:attribute] must be equal or before [:before_or_equal_date]
CUSTOM.LESS_THAN: FROM value cannot be greater than or equal to TO value.
CUSTOM.GREATER_THAN: TO value cannot be less than or equal to FROM value.
CUSTOM.ORG_STRUCT_REGEX: Name can only contain alphanumeric characters, spaces, -, _, and .

FIELDS.CHARITY_PLACEHOLDER: Search by charity name or tax ID
FIELDS.MEMBERSHIP_LABEL: The IRS prohibits using donor advised funds for memberships that are not 100% tax deductible.
FIELDS.NON_BINDING_PLEDGE_LABEL: Donor-advised funds can be used for a non-binding pledge. However, the IRS prohibits grants from a donor-advised fund from being used for a legally binding pledge.
FIELDS.CHARITY_EVENT_ATTENDING_MESSAGE: The IRS prohibits using donor-advised funds to pay for tickets to attend a CHARITY event. However, you can recommend a grant to the charity in support of a specific event as long as you have paid the full cost to attend the event on your own.
FIELDS.CHARITY_EVENT_NOT_ATTENDING_MESSAGE: The IRS prohibits to use a donor advised fund to pay for tickets to attend a charity event.
FIELDS.OTHER_LABEL: Creating your own custom purpose may result in a longer approval process, as it may require us to consult with the charity to confirm the grant meets our program guidelines. Please enter your custom use below.
